In the linked pages, you will find materials for each week of the course. You can use these pages to 

1. Access required readings
2. Submit *questions* about the readings to the teaching team (recall, questions about each reading are due to the teaching team by 9am on the day before the first lecture on a topic)
3. Download lecture slides
4. Find notes related to each lecture
